$enabled_desc.zh: 启用统一命名空间主题校验。

$on_mismatch_desc.en: Action when topic does not match active model.
$on_mismatch_desc.zh: 主题不匹配激活模型时的动作。

$allow_intermediate_publish_desc.en: Allow publish to non-endpoint tree nodes.
$allow_intermediate_publish_desc.zh: 允许发布到模型树中的非端点节点。

$validate_payload_desc.en: Validate payload JSON against endpoint payload schema on publish.
$validate_payload_desc.zh: 发布时按端点 payload schema 校验 JSON 载荷。

$exempt_topics_desc.en: Topic filters bypassing UNS Gate validation.
$exempt_topics_desc.zh: 绕过 UNS Gate 校验的主题过滤器。
